terms_section_1_content: By accessing and using Thai Variety Entertainment platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this platform.
terms_section_2_warning: You must be at least 20 years of age to use this Platform (Thai law compliance)
terms_section_2_content: This platform is strictly for adults who are 20 years of age or older, in compliance with Thai law. By using this platform, you represent and warrant that you are at least 20 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into this agreement. We reserve the right to request proof of age at any time.
terms_section_3_content: Thai Variety Entertainment is a premium adult entertainment platform connecting verified providers with clients. We provide a marketplace for adult entertainment services and facilitate bookings, payments, and communications. We are not an employment agency and do not employ providers.
terms_section_4_content: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials, all activities under their account, providing accurate and current information, complying with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws, and treating all platform users with respect and professionalism.
terms_section_5_content: All payments must be made through our secure payment system. Platform fees, service charges, and provider rates are clearly displayed before booking confirmation. Refund policies are subject to the specific circumstances of cancellation and are handled on a case-by-case basis. Users agree to pay all applicable fees and charges.
terms_section_6_content: The following activities are strictly prohibited: any illegal activities or services, trafficking or exploitation of any kind, harassment, threats, or abuse of other users, providing false information or impersonating others, attempting to bypass payment systems, sharing account access with unauthorized parties, and any activity that violates local, national, or international laws.
terms_section_7_content: Thai Variety Entertainment acts solely as a platform connecting users. We are not responsible for the conduct of users, the quality of services provided, disputes between users, or any damages arising from use of the platform. Users engage with each other at their own risk. Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.
terms_section_8_content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these terms, suspected fraudulent activity, or any reason at our sole discretion. Upon termination, your right to use the platform will immediately cease. Provisions of these terms that by their nature should survive termination shall survive.
terms_section_9_content: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Thailand. Any disputes arising from these terms or use of the platform shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Thailand.
terms_section_10_content: For questions or concerns regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@thaivariety.com or through our support center.
privacy_section_1_personal_content: Name, email address, phone number, date of birth (to verify age compliance), payment information, identity verification documents, profile information and photos, and communication records.
privacy_section_1_automatic_content: IP address, device information, browser type, usage patterns and analytics, location data, and cookies and tracking technologies.
privacy_section_2_content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, verify user identity and age compliance, process payments and transactions, facilitate communications between users, ensure platform security and prevent fraud, comply with legal obligations, send important updates and notifications, and analyze platform usage to enhance user experience.
privacy_section_3_never_sell: WE NEVER SELL YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION TO THIRD PARTIES
privacy_section_3_content: We may share your information only in the following limited circumstances: with other platform users as necessary to facilitate services, with payment processors to complete transactions, with law enforcement when required by law, with service providers who assist in platform operations (under strict confidentiality agreements), and in the event of a business transfer or merger (users will be notified).
privacy_section_4_content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including AES-256 encryption for data transmission and storage, secure payment processing through PCI-DSS compliant processors, regular security audits and updates, multi-factor authentication options, and strict access controls and employee confidentiality agreements. However, no system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy_section_5_content: You have the right to access your personal data, request correction of inaccurate data, request deletion of your data (subject to legal requirements), opt-out of marketing communications, withdraw consent where processing is based on consent, and data portability (receive your data in a structured format). To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@thaivariety.com.
privacy_section_6_content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance user experience, remember preferences, analyze platform usage, and provide personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but disabling cookies may affect platform functionality.
privacy_section_7_content: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements. Account data is typically retained for the duration of your account plus a reasonable period thereafter. Transaction records may be retained longer for legal and regulatory compliance.
privacy_section_8_warning: This Platform is NOT for individuals under 20 years of age
privacy_section_8_content: Our platform is exclusively for adults aged 20 and above. We do not knowingly collect information from individuals under 20 years of age. If we discover that we have inadvertently collected data from someone under 20, we will delete it immediately.
privacy_section_9_content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable laws, including GDPR and Thai PDPA compliance.
privacy_section_10_content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify users of material changes via email or prominent platform notice. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy_section_11_content: For questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@thaivariety.com or through our support center. We will respond to all legitimate requests within 30 days.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform.
faq.a1: Thai Variety Entertainment is a premium adult entertainment platform that connects verified providers with clients. We ensure safety, privacy, and quality through our verification system.
faq.a2: You must be at least 20 years old to use our platform. All users undergo age verification during registration.
faq.a3: Yes, we operate within Thai legal frameworks and comply with all applicable regulations. Adult entertainment services are regulated in Thailand.
faq.q4: How do I book a provider?
faq.a4: Browse our verified providers, select your preferred package, choose a date and time, and complete the payment. The provider will confirm your booking.
faq.a5: Yes, you can cancel a booking before it is confirmed. After confirmation, cancellation policies depend on the time remaining before the appointment.
faq.a6: Yes! During an active session, you can extend your booking time directly through the app. Simply pay for the additional time and continue your session.
faq.a7: We accept credit/debit cards via Stripe, PromptPay, and bank transfers. All payments are secure and encrypted.
faq.q8: How does the escrow system work?
faq.a8: When you pay for a booking, the money is held securely by our platform. After the service is completed (provider checks out), the payment is released to the provider minus our commission.
faq.a9: Providers pay a 10% platform commission + 2.75% payment processing fee. Clients pay no additional fees beyond the listed prices.
faq.a10: All providers undergo ID verification, face verification, and background checks. Only verified providers can accept bookings.
faq.a11: The SOS button allows providers to immediately alert our admin team and trusted contacts in case of emergency. Location data is shared for quick response.
faq.a12: We use encrypted communications, secure payments, and never share your personal information. Your booking history is confidential.
faq.q13: How do I become a provider?
faq.a13: Register as a provider, complete your profile, upload photos, verify your identity (ID + Face), and wait for approval. Once approved, you can start accepting bookings.
faq.a14: Payments are released to your wallet immediately after you check out from a session. You can then withdraw to your bank account.
faq.q15: Can I set my own schedule?
faq.a15: Yes! Providers have full control over their schedule. You can set your availability, off days, and manage your booking rules.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.what_are_desc: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide a better user experience by remembering your preferences, login status, and other settings.
cookies.essential_desc: Required for the website to function. These include authentication tokens and security cookies. Cannot be disabled.
cookies.functional_desc: Remember your preferences like language selection, theme settings, and other customizations.
cookies.analytics_desc: Help us understand how visitors use our website. We use this data to improve our services. Data is anonymized.
cookies.third_party_desc: We use the following third-party services that may set their own cookies:
cookies.manage_desc: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.
cookies.contact_desc: If you have any questions about our cookie policy, please contact us at
